head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ZIMMER, DAVID LAWRENCE, ''LARRY.''

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ZIMMER, DAVID LAWRENCE, ''LARRY.''

block.p: ZIMMER--David Lawrence, ''Larry.'' Of Fort Lee, NJ. President of (AST) Johnny Blaze of Manhattan. Husband of Eve (nee Millan). Father of Michelle Zimmer and Adam Zimmer. Stepfather of Glenn Rigberg and Beth Rapaport. Brother of Pearl Pripas and Bobbie Saks. Grandfather of Robyn and Russell Rapaport and Olivia and Aidan Rigberg. Services Friday, 11:30 AM, ''Gutterman-Musicant,'' 402 Park St, Hackensack, NJ. Contributions to American Lung Association, Susan B. Komen Breast Cancer or Make A Wish Foundation.

ZIMMER--David Lawrence, ''Larry.'' Of Fort Lee, NJ. President of (AST) Johnny Blaze of Manhattan. Husband of Eve (nee Millan). Father of Michelle Zimmer and Adam Zimmer. Stepfather of Glenn Rigberg and Beth Rapaport. Brother of Pearl Pripas and Bobbie Saks. Grandfather of Robyn and Russell Rapaport and Olivia and Aidan Rigberg. Services Friday, 11:30 AM, ''Gutterman-Musicant,'' 402 Park St, Hackensack, NJ. Contributions to American Lung Association, Susan B. Komen Breast Cancer or Make A Wish Foundation.
